comment: 10/10 teacher, encouraged participation but was not overbearing! She recognizes effort and isn't too harsh on mistakes. Definitely the teacher you want to have if you're a beginner. She also gives plenty of time for assignments and even notifies you beforehand. Also, has a GroupMe so she responds very fast.

Amazing professor! She is so helpful and caring honestly. There is a bit of homework but she gives you so much time to do it. You can even get extra credit all throughout the semester! I would definitely take this class again.

She is wonderful!! Very charismatic! She is so incredibly sweet and caring. She made this class a lot of fun. The homework seems like a lot but if you pace yourself its not a lot at all! I would definitely recommend her. I wish she taught all my classes!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Would take again

comment: Professor Martin is AMAZING! You must take her.

Profesora Martin is so awesome! She made learning Spanish a very enjoyable experience. If possible I will take Spanish II with profesora Martin. If you want to have fun learning Spanish you must take her!

Definitely the best Spanish professor in the whole school, If you need to take Spanish and actually want to learn the language then look no further, Professor Martin teaches Spanish very well and as long as you the Vistas you should pass this class with an A.

Professor Martin is a great Spanish professor.  She is clear, helpful, and funny. Participation is encouraged and graded though.  This includes contributing your thoughts and answering her questions in a much Spanish as possible.  She is very willing to meet outside of class to explain or help.   Very glad to have been taught under her.

Honestly one of the best Spanish professors I have ever had. She is almost too easy. All you have to do is listen to her and drop the whole "Why do I have to take a foreign language" attitude, and you'll do very well in this class. She is very reasonable and understanding. Also, her speaking (in Spanish) is very easy to understand.

One of the best professors I ever had. Very clear on what is to be expected. Very helpful and knowledgeable in Spanish. Tests were simple as long as you kept up with the VHL Central homework assignments.  Highly recommend to take her if you have difficulty in a foreign language class. The online class was worth taking rather than the lecture class.

Amazing professor, I've had her for 1001 and 1002. If possible, I'd take her for all future Spanish classes. Very, very easy class, but that doesn't mean you won't learn. The most difficult part of her classes are the exams, but if you study for them there's no reason to make less than a B. Very kind, relaxed, and easy to talk to.

Sra Martin is an amazing professor. I had her for hybrid 1001 and online 1002. Her course work is outlined from the beginning. She is very helpful and always willing to explain or put in a little extra effort to help you, and also offers extra credit. I would definitely take her classes again. I wish she taught intermediate Spanish!

I never knew what it would be like to take Spanish online but I knew a good bit, so I figured I would go ahead and try it out. Sra Martin is one of the best professors I have ever had. She makes sure you are aware of everything that is coming up and walks through the class with you step by step. She is always available for help. Loved this class!

Senora Martin is an amazing teacher. She is very fair and gives great feedback. She answered emails very quickly and will give you the guidance you need. She is even very accommodating. She let me make up work when I got behind after having my baby. I would definitely take her class again!
Awesome teacher!!! Be ready for lots of group work!! Study guides are very helpful!! Do as much extra credit as u can!!! Would take again if she's teaching the others I need for my Spanish minor!!!!
I took a hybrid. Easy, but a lot of outside class busy work. Se√±ora is so nice. Take her!! very understanding too !!

Sra. Martin was very helpful and willing to cooperate with you. She wouldn't take points off for late work especially her voice board assignments. I personally believe that if you want an A or even if you want to begin to learn the language, she is the professor to have.

Took her hybrid class.  Super easy and she is extremely helpful.  Knows her material.  Very friendly and generous.  Uses lots of resources to help you learn.  Taking her hybrid class for Span II as well.  Lots of chances for extra credit given.  Would recommend her to anybody wanting to learn Spanish.
Great Teacher, Very helpful. Easy class.

Very easy class if you have taken previous Spanish courses. She speaks really fast. Attendance is mandatory! Points are taken off grade if you miss more than 2 classes. Tons of skits and group work. Study guides are given prior to exams! Most homework is done online on WebSam.
Teaches like you are a 6 year old. Boring and mandatory attendance
She's hot!
I looove Professor Martin. She's sweet, helpful, and understanding. She loves Spanish. I had a great time with her. No pressure or stress from this class at all. My all time fave.

Awesome professor! Obviously has great mastery of the language. Very kind and has a friendly approach to teaching. Material is straight forward from the book. Online exercises, 3 tests including the final, a few quizzes, 2 one page compositions in espanol, and a presentation. Attendance is mandatory. GO TO CLASS!
Very sweet and helpful professor. I went in knowing zero spanish and came out with an A. Lets you redo homework of you don't do well the first time.

A super nice teacher and wants to help as much as she can. She will help edit assignments prior to their due date. Teaches with assumed knowledge in spanish. Not the best with helping in speaking the language. but overall a nice lady and a very passable class.

She uses the text a lot. But the class is generally very easy. As long as you do what she asks and study a little you'll be fine. She likes to joke a little and keeps the class interested. Very lenient with late assignments. But, finals are department made and she might not always have time to cover everything they want her to.
